name: City Mayhem (Hey! I'mEvil)
description:
Set in modern day where pollution that human has cost make mother nature mad and send out monster to destroy everything man made. We follow JJ (short for Jenny T Janitor) on her mission to stop all the monsters from destroy everything.

ASWD:  movement

Space:  dodge

Left Click:  shooting water (refilled by standing on monster's liquid) 

Right Click:  throw a plushy out to distract monster

 

This is my first try on making game and working on a jam called TheGameDev.tv Game Jam 2022 (yes first time for both XP) and yes I fail miserably. Over scoped, missed submission time and stuff but well what can I do any way :P hope yall enjoy this lil game
